sentences.english: Users are unaware of all this behind-the-scenes action.
sentences.chinese: 用户并不知道所有这些后台操作。

sentences.english: Can be divided into tutor system and background information to the database management system.
sentences.chinese: 可分为家教信息浏览系统和后台数据库管理系统。

sentences.english: Monkeys rest backstage after a show.
sentences.chinese: 猴子们表演完后在后台休息。

sentences.english: Threads are the true way to do background processing.
sentences.chinese: 线程才是进行后台处理的真正方法。

sentences.english: The teachers could manage the information on ATW by themselves.
sentences.chinese: 教师可通过后台管理系统自主自助维护信息内容。

sentences.english: Davenport describes the most effective style of leading as "offstage management."
sentences.chinese: 达文波特说，最有效的管理方式是“后台管理”。

sentences.english: Develop the architecture for the clothing e-commerce network in the background management system.
sentences.chinese: 开发出针对服饰电子商务网后台管理系统的架构。

sentences.english: Can realize that the backstage supporter divides automatically singly .
sentences.chinese: 能够实现后台自动分单。

sentences.english: are so lucky to have a team of Chinese students and professionals helping us backstage.
sentences.chinese: 我们很幸运拥有一群中国学生和专业人员在后台帮忙。

sentences.english: They came backstage afterward, cooing and toadying to him.
sentences.chinese: 她们随后来到后台，对他娇语谄媚。

sentences.english: Backstage at the "girlie" show at the state fair.
sentences.chinese: 在后台的“娘娘腔”，在公平的状态显示。

sentences.english: Most Indian firms work on IT projects for back offices, information management systems for their various business processes, said Hsu.
sentences.chinese: 多数印度公司从事后台IT支持和信息管理，许说。

sentences.english: A background agent enforces these policy limits.
sentences.chinese: 这些策略限制由一个后台代理程序实施。

sentences.english: A simple one-column, tableless, fluid width administration theme.
sentences.chinese: 单栏位，无表格，宽度可伸展的后台版型。

sentences.english: When he came in upon Carrie she was still with Drouet.
sentences.chinese: 当他进了后台门找到嘉莉时，她仍然和杜洛埃在一起。

sentences.english: You can also run it in the background while redirecting output to a file.
sentences.chinese: 也可以在后台运行该命令，并将输出重定向到文件。

definition: private correspondence/personal letter/(computing) personal message (PM)/to message sb
to leave a message/to leave one's comments/message
to scan a QR code or barcode
Weixin or WeChat (mobile text and voice messaging service developed by Tencent 騰訊|腾讯[Teng2 xun4])
to transmit/to dispatch/to issue (an official document or credential)
to ask/to invite/please (do sth)/to treat (to a meal etc)/to request
to reply/to recover/to return (to a previous condition)/Re: in reply to (email)
variant of 聯繫|联系[lian2 xi4]
connection/contact/relation/to get in touch with/to integrate/to link/to touch
to sticky (an Internet forum thread etc)
